name: Proto-Indo-European
description: The predecessor of today's modern European languages.

name: Proto-Altaic
description: The (hypothetical) predecessor of today's modern Japonic/Turkish languages.

name: Proto-Semitic
description: The predecessor of today's modern Middle Eastern languages.

name: Proto-Bantu
description: The predecessor of today's modern West African languages.

name: Austronesian
description: The predecessor of today's modern Indonesian/Malaysian languages.
